contentList.content: Summon a weapon to your hand. It uses the wielder's <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability Modifier</LSTag>, and its damage is magical.
You are <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with the weapon. You can only have one at a time. The weapon disappears if you are more than [1] away from it for more than 10 rounds.
Bind to your weapon. Its damage becomes magical, you cannot drop or throw it, and you become <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it if you weren't already.

You can only have 1 pact weapon at any time.

The weapon returns to its previous state if you are more than [1] away from it for more than 10 rounds.
If you summoned it, it disappears. If you bound a weapon to you, it returns to its previous state.
A long, deep crack runs through the side of the wood, filled with crusted blood.
The head of this flail is shiny and new, its wooden shaft still coarse and unmarked by blood.
A summonable weapon granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
The rectangular engravings on this axe's wooden handle have been nearly scratched away by armoured hands.
Traces of dried viscera ring many of the iron spikes embedded in this oak club.
This sword's guard, held haphazardly in place by thin rope, wobbles slightly when swung.
Simple but sharp. The shaft of this glaive is worn smooth with use.
Part of the spike affixed to the top of this halberd has snapped off, leaving a cruel barb.
A straightforward hatchet, dulled slightly from chopping wood - or bones.
A rusted fishing harpoon, repurposed as a weapon.
This crossbow's cast iron latch is mottled with blooms of rust.
A blacksmith's pride and joy, repurposed for combat. Its steel head is tarnished from years in the forge.
A common sword, passed between hands both fresh and battle-scarred.
A standard-issue crossbow, used by many guardsmen.
This small, agile bow bears a beautiful elven string, easy to draw but tough as steel.
A simple but effective mace, cast en masse by human blacksmiths.
Hammers like this are used in many dwarven competitions, testing who can throw them the farthest while enduring the most ale.
More of this morningstar's iron spikes are bent than not.
This pike's broad steel head has been repeatedly bent and hammered back into its original shape.
Someone has carved twenty-seven small lines into the hard wood.
A slender but deadly sword, favoured by Waterdhavian nobility.
This human-made scimitar falls far short of replicating the quality of the drow style it clearly imitates.
A farming tool with a wicked edge, spilling blood and grain with equal ease.
An aged spear, its steel head nicked by the blows of a dozen battles.
It is said tridents were brought to the surface when Umberlee threw a Triton prince who scorned her onto Faerûn's shores.
This hammer's noticeable lack of upkeep hardly matters, given its heft.
A pickaxe modified to pierce flesh and armour rather than stone.
Useful for writing your name in damp slush and not much else.
Useful for writing your name in damp slush and not much else.
Useful for writing your name in damp slush and not much else.
Useful for writing your name in damp slush and not much else.
A summonable warpick granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable warhammer granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable trident granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable spear granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable sickle granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable shortsword granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable shortbow granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable scimitar granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable rapier granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable quarterstaff granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable pike granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable morningstar granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable maul granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable mace granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable longsword granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable longbow granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable light hammer granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable light crossbow granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable javelin granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable heavy crossbow granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable hand crossbow granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable halberd granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable weapon granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable greatclub granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable greataxe granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable glaive granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable flail granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable dagger granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable battleaxe granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable club granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable handaxe granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
Pact of the Blade: Light Hammer
Pact of the Blade: Hand Crossbow
Pact of the Blade: Heavy Crossbow
Pact of the Blade: Light Crossbow

You can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_DnD5R_PactOfTheBlade">Summon</LSTag> a pact weapon, or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_DnD5R_PactOfTheBlade_Bind">Bind</LSTag> the one you are wielding, making it magical.

Pact weapons use the wielder's <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability Modifier</LSTag> instead of <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>.
Bind Pact Weapon: Ranged Off Hand
Bind to your off hand ranged weapon. Its damage becomes magical, you cannot drop or throw it, and you become <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it if you weren't already.
Bind Pact Weapon: Melee Main Hand
Bind to your main hand melee weapon. Its damage becomes magical, you cannot drop or throw it, and you become <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it if you weren't already.
Bind Pact Weapon: Melee Off Hand
Bind to your off hand melee weapon. Its damage becomes magical, you cannot drop or throw it, and you become <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it if you weren't already.
Bind Pact Weapon: Ranged Main Hand
Bind to your main hand ranged weapon. Its damage becomes magical, you cannot drop or throw it, and you become <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it if you weren't already.

Whenever you attack with your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STATUS_DND5R_PACTBLADE">Pact Weapon</LSTag>, you can cause the weapon to deal Necrotic, Psychic, or Radiant damage or its normal damage type.
The warlock bound to this weapon is always <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it. The weapon's damage is magical.
Whenever you attack with your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STATUS_DND5R_PACTBLADE">Pact Weapon</LSTag>, you can cause the weapon to deal Radiant damage.
Whenever you attack with your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STATUS_DND5R_PACTBLADE">Pact Weapon</LSTag>, you can cause the weapon to deal Necrotic damage.
Whenever you attack with your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STATUS_DND5R_PACTBLADE">Pact Weapon</LSTag>, you can cause the weapon to deal Psychic damage.

Can make an additional free attack after making a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STATUS_DND5R_PACTBLADE">Pact Weapon</LSTag> attack. If you gain the Extra Attack feature from more than one class, they don't add together.

Once per turn, an attack made with your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STATUS_DND5R_PACTBLADE">Pact Weapon</LSTag> deals additional damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> modifier. In addition, you gain [2] plus your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> modifier.
You can make two additional attacks after attacking with your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STATUS_DND5R_PACTBLADE">Pact Weapon</LSTag>.
